## Be the one platform your customers need to run their business
Launch payment solutions that look and feel like an extension of your brand. From onboarding to activation, Mercoa gives you everything to provide a branded payment experience that helps your customers pay and get paid faster while proactively managing their cashflow.
### [Accounts Payable (AP)
  * Process any bill through an intelligent email inbox or manual upload
  * Onboard vendors and gather vendor payment details
  * Keep track of partial payments, apply vendor credits, and provide intelligent payment scheduling suggestions based on cash flow
  * AI auto-categorization of line items, GL accounts, and even industry-specific codings
  * Utilize simple or complex approval workflows

Learn more](http://mercoa.com/</solutions/accounts-payable>)
### [Accounts Receivable (AR)
  * AI Agent automatically turns contracts into invoices
  * Send branded invoices and payment links with their logo and branding
  * Automate payment collection with AI-driven payment reminders
  * Apply late fees when applicable and resubmit invoices

Learn more](http://mercoa.com/</solutions/accounts-receivable>)
## Unlock new revenue streams
Increase LTV and on-platform TPV by offering your customers a financial one-stop-shop that provides visibility, control, and flexibility around their AP & AR. Expand your opportunity to monetize on payments.
  * Earn an additional $300/month per user in SaaS fees
  * Monetize payments with customizable transaction fees
  * Increase payment margins with premium options like virtual card disbursements, pay-by-card, and BNPL


## Built for developers
Developer experience is in our DNA. Mercoa has backend and frontend SDKs for languages like TypeScript, Python, and Java. Our docs are part of the product, not an afterthought.
[See Docs](http://mercoa.com/<https:/docs.mercoa.com>)
```
import{ MercoaApi, MercoaApiClient }from"@mercoa/javascript"
const mercoa =newMercoaApiClient({ token:'YOUR_API_KEY',});
const entity =await mercoa.entity.find({ foreignId:'YOUR_CUSTOMER_ID'});
const invoices =await mercoa.entity.invoice.find(entity.id,{ status:[  MercoaApi.InvoiceStatus.APPROVED,  MercoaApi.InvoiceStatus.SCHEDULED],});
```

### Company Overview: Mercoa

**Name:** Mercoa  
**Founded:** 2022  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 2 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  
**Group Partner:** Dalton Caldwell  
**Industry Tags:** Fintech, API, San Francisco Bay Area  
**Website:** [mercoa.com](http://mercoa.com)

---

### Mission

Mercoa is on a mission to empower Vertical SaaS companies to become their own "Bill.com" by providing a seamless, AI-powered BillPay and Accounts Payable API. They aim to enable these platforms to integrate invoicing and payment solutions within just three weeks.

### What They Do

Initially focused on giving Vertical SaaS companies the tools they need to offer payment services, Mercoa provides a comprehensive suite of embedded workflows and payment solutions. This includes:

- **Accounts Payable (AP):** 
   - Intelligent bill processing through email or manual uploads.
   - Vendor onboarding and payment management.
   - AI-driven payment scheduling and auto-categorization of expenses.

- **Accounts Receivable (AR):** 
   - Automatic invoice creation from contracts.
   - Branded invoicing and payment link generation.
   - AI reminders for payment collection and penalty applications for late payments.

### Key Features

- **Developer-Centric Approach:** With backend and frontend SDKs available in languages like TypeScript, Python, and Java, Mercoa prioritizes a smooth developer experience. Their documentation is designed to integrate seamlessly into existing workflows.

- **Flexible Implementation:** Choose from React components for maximum customization, a hosted iFrame for quick setup, or a full API for those who need complete control over their payment solutions.

- **Revenue Potential:** By offering integrated payment solutions, partners can unlock new revenue streams, potentially earning an additional $300 per month per user and monetizing transaction fees.

### Current Focus

Mercoa is actively enhancing its platform to facilitate faster payments, better cash flow management, and a fully branded payment experience for their customers. They aim to be the go-to solution for Vertical SaaS companies looking to simplify financial operations.

### Quick Links

- [Book a Demo](http://mercoa.com/<https:/calendly.com/sai-mercoa/intro>)
- [Documentation](http://mercoa.com/<https:/docs.mercoa.com>)
- [Blog](http://mercoa.com/</blog>)

Each aspect of Mercoa's offering builds towards a goal: making it easier for businesses to handle their financial transactions efficiently while maintaining their brand identity. They are particularly focused on ensuring every interaction around billing and payments feels like an extension of the customer’s own platform.

In essence, Mercoa is positioning itself as the underlying infrastructure that can drive financial operations for a plethora of Vertical SaaS companies. If you’re running a specific vertical and want to enable your customers to manage payments effortlessly, this is definitely a solution worth exploring.
